description: This table contains the pathology codes that were changed during a finding record audit action. For one audit action there can be multiple pathology codes that were changed; this corresponds to the third primary key in this table, VALUE_LINE. This table will likely be joined to from RESULT_AUDIT, which holds the majority of the finding audit information.

columns.name: FINDING_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the finding record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the associated audit information in this finding record. Together with FINDING_ID, this forms the foreign key to the RESULT_AUDIT table.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple pathology codes that are associated with the finding audit information from the RESULT_AUDIT table.

columns.name: PATH_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The pathology code category ID, if any, for the action being audited.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes
